Disease_Carrier.display_help: You have been infected with the Vahzilok Wasting Disease. This disease, introduced by the Vahzilok, is slowly wasting you away. Find a cure, quick! Your Max Hit Points, Endurance, Regeneration, and Recovery have been reduced.
Disease_Carrier.display_target_help: The Diseased Vahzilok is infecting you, reducing your recovery and regeneration rates.
Disease_Carrier.display_victim_hit: The Diseased Vahzilok is infecting you, reducing your recovery and regeneration rates.
